title: Community Solar Acceleration Microgrant
summary: Supports planning and pilot installation of community solar arrays for municipal or nonprofit facilities serving frontline communities.

title: Urban Heat Island Mitigation Fund
summary: Funds neighborhood-led shade, reflective roofing, and cooling center projects in disadvantaged census tracts.

title: Clean Mobility for All Challenge
summary: Supports community organizations piloting electric shuttle, e-bike lending, or last-mile mobility programs for low-income residents.
